tool_description: uNoGS (unofficial Netflix online Global Search) allows anyone to  search the global Netflix catalog.
name: uNoGS
title: uNoGS

api_list.name: /static/genres
api_list.description: Get Static list of Genres (updated daily)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/static/genres"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/static/genres"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /title/genres
api_list.description: All Genres Associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: netflix_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/images
api_list.description: All Images associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: netflix_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/details
api_list.description: General Details associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: netflix_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/episodes
api_list.description: All Episodes associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: season_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix season ID e.g. 70105286 for Breaking Bad season 1

required_parameters.name: netflix_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /title/countries
api_list.description: All Country/Language information associated with a Title

required_parameters.name: netflix_id
required_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

api_list.name: /search/titles
api_list.description:
Parameter Notes:
new_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.

optional_parameters.name: end_rating
optional_parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

optional_parameters.name: country_list
optional_parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: year date > 1900

optional_parameters.name: person
optional_parameters.description: name of person in title

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: Order of Response

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: year date > 1900

optional_parameters.name: top250
optional_parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Movies number 0-250

optional_parameters.name: start_rating
optional_parameters.description: number between 1 and 10, aligns with imdb rating, if there is one

optional_parameters.name: top250tv
optional_parameters.description: IMDB top 250 Series number 0-250

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: search all titles by name

optional_parameters.name: expiring
optional_parameters.description: if 'true' show all titles set to expire

optional_parameters.name: subtitle
optional_parameters.description: name of subtitle language e.g. english

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: movie or series

optional_parameters.name: genre_list
optional_parameters.description: CSV list of genres, see misc/genre endpoint

optional_parameters.name: audio
optional_parameters.description: name of audio language e.g english

optional_parameters.name: audio_sub_andor
optional_parameters.description: and=language in bot audio and sub, or=language in either audio or sub

optional_parameters.name: country_andorunique
optional_parameters.description: and=titles in all countries, or=any title in these countries, unique=unique titles in chosen countries

api_list.name: /search/people
api_list.description: Search for people by title name, person name, or netflix_id

optional_parameters.name: netflix_id
optional_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

optional_parameters.name: person_type
optional_parameters.description: what the person did on the project

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: search all titles by name

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

api_list.name: /search/deleted
api_list.description:
Search for Deleted Titles by Country or Title Name
delete_date will either take a single date and check for all titles added after that date or it will take 2 dates separated by a comma to check titles added between them.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: search all titles by name

optional_parameters.name: netflix_id
optional_parameters.description: actual netflix ID for the title e.g. 70143836 for Breaking Bad

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit of object returned

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: where you want the response to start e.g. 10 starts with the 10th element

optional_parameters.name: country_list
optional_parameters.description: CSV list of country IDs e.g. 46,78

api_list.name: /static/countries
api_list.description: Get Static list of Supported Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com/static/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogs-unogs-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
